subject: Faulty RGB
description_text:
Hello,

I have an issue with my Simsonn Pro x Ultra brake pedal. The RGB lights are
not working. They only flicker and show the incorrect colour after setting
in Simsonn manager.

I have attached a video showing the issue.

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi James Waygood,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you replacement LED light assemblies for the left and right sides of the ProX Ultra, which you can install yourself.

Hello,

Order number: SSN3196.

James Waygood
8 Trinity Road
Gloucester
GL4 5GB

07554383706

On Wed, 17 Dec 2025 at 09:49, service@simsonn.com
Hi James Waygood,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047187420163

Hello,

Tracking says it’s been delivered but I have not received anything. What
address did you send them to?

Thanks

On Wed, 24 Dec 2025 at 08:54, service@simsonn.com
Hello can you tell me what is happening with this please???

Hello,

Can you answer me? Tracking says they went to liverpool but the address I
sent you is gloucester.

Please reply thanks

Hello,

Can you tell me where the part was sent to as I have still not received it.

Thanks
